text: The 1988 United States presidential election in Idaho took place on November 8, 1988, that was part of the 1988 United States presidential election. Incumbent Vice President George H. W. Bush and his running mate U.S. Senator Dan Quayle had won 4 electoral votes in the Electoral College. Category:1988 United States presidential election Category:History of Idaho
title: 1988 United States presidential election in Idaho
